name: RodMän Jr
overview: Rodman and Rodwina have an offspring. The dirty bastard called Junior. He must avoid annoying and stupid monster twins Nic and Dave and collect colourful pills. And there are bombs too. Junior can destroy enemies or doors with them. The main problem is a scrolled world which means that junior does not have too much time to make complicated plans, if you go off the screen you lose a life.
